name: Cat Cooling Mat
imageAlt: Blue self-cooling gel mat for cats to rest on during warm weather
shortDescription: Help your cat beat Singapore's heat with a self-cooling gel mat that needs no electricity.
description: Singapore's tropical climate can be tough on our furry friends. This pressure-activated cooling mat drops up to 7 degrees below ambient temperature the moment your cat lies down — no refrigeration or power needed. Lightweight and foldable, it fits perfectly in your cat's favourite napping spot.
features: Pressure-activated gel cools up to 7°C below room temperature
No electricity, water, or refrigeration required
Foldable and portable — great for travel or vet visits
Non-toxic gel is completely safe even if punctured
